data.name: This Is the Police 2 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself with the music of This Is the Police 2, the official soundtrack includes the following tracks::

1. A Nordic Travail (03:46)
2. An Iniquitous Inclination (01:25)
3. Animal Horror (02:53)
4. Attrition (02:19)
5. Careless Love (03:29)
6. Cold Bones (03:23)
7. Consolation Prize (03:33)
8. Contrition (04:04)
9. From The Old (04:20)
10. Groundhog (04:59)
11. In From The Cold (03:25)
12. Jagged (03:10)
13. Old Habits (03:47)
14. Redman (03:14)
15. Snus (02:50)
16. Step Aside (03:33)
17. Temporary Suicide (02:29)
18. The Stoic (03:37)
19. Tooth For A Tooth (02:18)
20. Värdelös (04:36)
21. Wrong Side Of The Grave (03:12)
22. Zeitgeist (04:57)

data.short_description: Immerse yourself with the music of This Is the Police 2!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are for the game. This is the Official Soundtrack.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5830 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are for the game. This is the Official Soundtrack.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are for the game. This is the Official Soundtrack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are for the game. This is the Official Soundtrack.
